name: searchleads-enrichment
title: SearchLeads Enrichment
description: Enrich leads from Apollo.io search results using SearchLeads API

events.name: ENRICHED_RECORDS
events.title: Enriched Records (per 1K)
events.description: Charge based on the number of records successfully enriched, rounded up to the nearest 1000 records

input.title: SearchLeads Enrichment
input.description: Enrich leads from Apollo.io search results using SearchLeads API

apolloLink.title: Apollo Search Link
apolloLink.description: The Apollo.io search URL containing the leads you want to enrich. Copy the URL from your Apollo search results page.

noOfLeads.title: Number of Leads
noOfLeads.description: The maximum number of leads to enrich from the Apollo search results. Must be in multiples of 1000 (e.g., 1000, 2000, 3000, etc.) up to 50,000.

fileName.title: File Name
fileName.description: A descriptive name for your enriched leads file (without extension).
